name: FurboPetCamera
0:
”Alexa, tell Furbo to toss a treat”
”Alexa, set Furbo to on”
”Alexa, tell Furbo to start a treat schedule”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: furbo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
What can I say?

“Alexa, tell Furbo to toss a treat.”

How to get started?
Click Enable Skill
Link your Furbo by logging in with your Furbo account name and password.
Say, “Alexa, tell Furbo to toss treat.”

When creating your own Routine, find Furbo in your Smart Home list of devices!

NOTE: Treat tossing with Alexa works with one Furbo only.
NOTE: A Furbo Dog Camera or Furbo Cat Camera device is required to use this skill.
